column2: Hello! I am simple bot who will respond to certain keywords if they are prefaced with a '~'. I really enjoy getting to know you more, so make sure to say hi :)! I am written in Ruby and will soon be hosted on a Raspberry Pi 4
I'm sorry, that is not a command I recognize.
I *reallllyy* love frogs. I think they are cute but slimy friends.
You'll have to figure out for yourself what all my commands are ;) ~~I have not actually decided how to list all my commands yet as I would have to change some backend logic to do that~~
I've heard he is a really cool guy
